title: CVE-2021-44228 (Log4Shell) Exploit Detected
summary: The internal Java Application Server is running an unpatched version of Log4j and has been targeted with the CVE-2021-44228 exploit. This vulnerability allows remote code execution, making it critical to apply the available patches immediately.
investigation_steps: Identify all services that use Log4j
Check the Log4j versions for each service
Audit logs to identify potential lateral movement or data exfiltration
Implement network and application-level controls to block further exploitation
verdict: Immediate action required: Unpatched Log4j server is under active attack.
